          <title>
            <string language="sl">Kalorimetrija: ugotovi  specifično toploto</string>
            <string language="en">Calorimetry: find the specific heat</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kalorimetrie: finden Sie die spezifische 
Hitze</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Calorimetrie : trouvez la chaleur 
spécifique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Calorimetry: encontre o calor específico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Calorimetria: trovi il calore specifico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Calorimetry: βρείτε τη συγκεκριμένη θερμότητα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Calorimetría: encuentre el calor 
específico</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Kovinski predmet potopimo v izolirano posodo z vodo.</string>
            <string language="en">The metallic object is submerged into an isolated container full of water.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die metallische Nachricht wird in einen 
lokalisierten Behälter voll Wasser versenkt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'objet métallique est submergé dans un 
récipient d'isolement complètement de l'eau.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O objeto metálico é submergido em um recipiente 
isolado completamente da água.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'oggetto metallico è sommerso in un contenitore 
isolato in pieno di acqua.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το μεταλλικό αντικείμενο καταδύεται σε ένα 
απομονωμένο σύνολο εμπορευματοκιβωτίων του ύδατος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El objeto metálico se sumerge en un envase 
aislado por completo de agua.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
